comment.body:
In a network, not only the infrastructure, it need more activities.
in centralization, twitter/facebook/IM are very populor. they are the 90% 

decentralized is for strangers, it is not for your real friends in the real world.
what is the most populor activity in the strangers?
i will not share my real world life in zoerome, but i can chat with somebody in a groupchat.
with more activities, the network is more big. after all, the nodes are the key of a decentralized network.
